Hello Antonino,

there currently is no other place than the JIRA issue to get this 
feature from and apply the given patch to the codebase yourself.

I think the patch should apply to 1.12.1, but I'm not sure about that.
But I'm sure it won't apply to SVN HEAD cleanly as there have been some 
changes in some of the classes the patch modifies.

My solution hasn't been accepted (yet?) into SVN and I think its far 
more intrusive than what I'd prefer myself. It has proven to work for 
myself - but thats it.

Maybe I'll work on a Heritrix 2 based implementation of this feature 
that could have better inclusion into Heritrix codebase -  but atm I 
don't have time to work on it.

Regards
   Olaf Freyer

susannanino schrieb:
> 
> 
> Hello,
> I've a problem crawling a site written in .NET with a form that uses
> VIEWSTATE hidden field for postback action. So the same url is used
> for displaying the form and for displaying the results (after post
> back) that i'm interested to crawl.
> I read the issue HER-1218 and I think it could be a solution.
> Where can I find the complete code, not the patch, of this issue
> implementation?
> Is there another chance to post a form with some values (also the
> default values) i.e. reposting the hidden VIEWSTATE and some other fields?
> Thanks in advance,
> Antonino
>
